info.name: visual shepard tone
info.description: sorry for the misspelling and thanks @fabriceneyret2 for the correction! shepard, not shepherd: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shepard_tone

renderpass.code:
void mainImage( out vec4 f, in vec2 c ){ vec2 uv = c/iResolution.xy;float
t=fract(iTime),col=0.;for (float oct=0.;oct<4.;++oct) col+=((oct==0.)?t:(
oct==3.)?1.-t:1.)*texture(iChannel0,(uv.xy-0.5)*exp2(t+oct)+(floor(iTime)
-oct+4.)*vec2(23.4353,75.3456)).x;f=vec4(vec3(sqrt(col*0.25)),1.);}
renderpass.name: Image
